document_data.name: Ondar
document_data.mainbody: '''Ondar''' was a farmer in the village of [[Toralth]] in [[Tethyr]] in [[1370 DR]].
document_data.History:
In 1370 DR, he lost six head of cattle to some [[gnoll]]s.

Soon after, on [[Uktar 10]], Ondar was invited by his best friend [[Tadaz]] to the [[Blue Badger Inn]] in order to honor Tadaz's son [[Tural]] heading off to join Tethyr's new army at [[Riatavin]].
